resources.string: Allow calls from the numbers you have contacted.
Allow calls from numbers you have called.
Allow calls from numbers you have sent a message to.
Allow calls from numbers you have already answered.
Allow calls from numbers within the selected groups.
Allow calls from numbers with the same country code as your.
Allow calls from numbers with country codes different from yours.
Allow calls from mobile numbers with the same country code as your.
Process calls from numbers matching regular expression.
Allow calls from numbers matching regular expression.
Allow X registered call(s) from the same number within a set amount of minutes.
Count has to be lower than minutes. Because Android caches the result, calls have to be out of the cache interval.
Minimal timeout in seconds between repeated calls.
Allow calls from numbers found in messages.
Allow calls from numbers that sent you a message.
Temporarily allow calls from mobile numbers found in incoming messages text.
How much time the number will be able to call you. Modifiers: [d]ays [h]ours [m]inutes
Block all incoming calls. To also block numbers from contacts you have to grant a permission.
Allow calls from numbers in your contacts.
Allow calls from strangers without a number.
Allow calls from numbers with length from 3 up to 5 digits.
Allow calls from numbers not starting with a plus.
Allow calls from numbers passing STIR verification.
Enable broadcast receiver to control Silence with intents.
Sets whether the incoming call should be blocked.
Sets whether the incoming call should be disconnected as if the user had manually rejected it. This should only be checked if the call is disallowed.

Sets whether ringing should be silenced for the incoming call. The call will, however, still be sent to the default dialer app if it is not blocked. Checking this only makes sense when the call has not been disallowed.
Sets whether the incoming call should not be displayed in the call log. This should only be checked if the call is disallowed. Calls will still be logged with type BLOCKED_TYPE.
Sets whether a missed call notification should not be shown for the incoming call. This should only be checked if the call is disallowed.
Are you sure you want to allow %1$s to trigger destructive panic actions\?
Allow calls from some miscellaneous groups/identifiers.
Process all calls from one or both SIM cards.
Enter the message to send when a call is blocked. Leave empty to not send an SMS.
